title: Ancient Echoes
description: Elese lives in a brutal medieval world where people have been trying to kill her since she was eight-years-old. Not that she blames them. After all, she is a monster. But in order to live peacefully she must hunt down those that are hunting her and at sixteen she is stronger than most men. She considers herself invincible and never imagines it will be those she loves most that will suffer for her naivety.
author: R.J. Clawson
